attributes.action: clearly label lilys to be highly toxic to cats  even fatel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we had two beautiful male cats less than a year old, they were brothers,unaware that lilys are highly toxic to cats,my mum brought lilys into the house, some how del boy our cat ate a part of the lily within a few days he was dead,his brother rodney is now also fighting the effects of lily poisoning .
i want to campaign for the lily family of plants and cut flowers to be clearly labled as toxic and or deadly to cats .
a large red circle with a cat in it and a red cross through it
